title: ‘An Important Prelude to Opening Weekend’: Wout van Aert Starts Mission to Find Missing Monuments
content:
Van Aert resumes quest for elusive Flanders-Roubaix success with form-finding racing in Spain, Portugal.

Read the full article at ‘An Important Prelude to Opening Weekend’: Wout van Aert Starts Mission to Find Missing Monuments on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
